data.title: TS-464 | Software Specs
data.meta_description: TS-464 er et kompakt NAS med 4 pladser og overlegen ydeevne. Med understøttelse af op til 66 TB storage og 4 TB M.2 SSD-cachelagring* til en overkommelig pris klarer TS-464 dine multitaskingudfordringer i forbindelse med filhåndtering, backup, samarbejde og videokonvertering.
data.meta_site_name: QNAP Systems, Inc. - Network Attached Storage (NAS)
data.text:
TS-464 Specification

TS-464-8G

TS-464-4G

TS-464-8G

CPU Intel® Celeron® N5095 4 kerner/4 tråde processor, burst op til 2,9 GHz CPU-arkitektur 64-bit x86 Grafikprocessorer Intel® UHD Graphics Floating Point-enhed Krypteringsmotor (AES-NI) Hardwareaccelereret transkodning Systemhukommelse 8 GB RAM Maksimal hukommelse 8 GB Flash-hukommelse 4 GB (Dual boot OS-beskyttelse) Drevplads 4 x 3,5" SATA 6 Gb/s

Systemet leveres uden harddisk.

Listen med harddiskkompatibilitet kan findes på https://www.qnap.com/compatibility/

Drevkompatibilitet 3,5-tommer SATA harddiske

2,5-tommer SATA solid state drev Hot-swap M.2-slot 2 x M.2 2280 PCIe Gen 3 x1

Compatible with NVMe SSD PCIe Gen 3 and above. Please refer to https://www.qnap.com/compatibility/ for compatibility.

Understøttelse af SSD-cacheacceleration 2,5 Gigabit Ethernet-port (2,5 G/1 G/100 M) 2 (2,5 G/1 G/100 M/10 M) 5 Gigabit Ethernet-port (5 G/2,5 G/1 G/100 M) Valgfrit via PCIe-udvidelseskort 10 Gigabit Ethernet-port Valgfrit via PCIe-udvidelseskort Wake on LAN (WOL) Jumbo-ramme PCIe-slot 1

Slot 1: PCIe Gen 3 x2

Kortmål for PCIe-slot: 190 x 68,9 x 18,76 mm / 7,48 x 2,71 x 0,74 tommer.

USB 2.0-port 2 USB 3.2 Gen 2-port (10 Gbps) 2 x Type A IR-sensor (valgfri QNAP RM-IR004 fjernbetjening) HDMI™ -udgang 1, HDMI™ 2.1 (up to 4096 x 2160 @ 60Hz) Formfaktor Tower LED-indikatorer Strøm/Status, LAN, USB, HDD 1-4 Knapper Strøm, USB-kopi, Nulstil Mål (HxBxD) 165 × 170 × 226.5 mm

Dimensioner inkluderer ikke fodpude (fodpude kan være op til 30mm / 1,18 tommer høj afhængig af model)

Vægt (netto) 2.26 kg Vægt (brutto) 3.59 kg Driftstemperatur 0 - 40 °C (32 - 104 °F) Opbevaringstemperatur -20 - 70 °C (-4 - 158 °F) Relativ luftfugtighed 5-95 % RH ikke-kondenserende, vådtemperatur: 27 ˚C (80,6 ˚F) Strømforsyningsenhed 90 W-adapter, 100-240 V Strømforbrug: HDD-slumretilstand 21.618 W Strømforbrug: Driftstilstand, typisk 40.536 W

Testet med drevene helt fyldt op.

Blæser 1 x 120 mm, 12 VDC Systemadvarsel Summer Kensington-sikkerhedsslot Standardgaranti 3 Maks. antal samtidige forbindelser (CIFS) - med maks. hukommelse 1500

Note: Use only QNAP memory modules to maintain system performance and stability. For NAS devices with more than one memory slot, use QNAP modules with identical specifications and refer to the hardware user manual to install compatible QNAP memory modules.

Warning: Using unsupported modules may degrade performance, cause errors, or prevent the operating system from starting.

QNAP reserves the right to replace partial parts or accessories if the original is no longer available from its manufacturer/supplier. Any replacement would be fully tested and verified to meet strict compatibility and stability guidelines and will deliver identical performance to the original.

The terms HDMI, HDMI High-Definition Multimedia Interface, HDMI trade dress and the HDMI Logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of HDMI Licensing Administrator, Inc.

Product images are for illustrative purposes only and may differ from the actual product. Due to differences in monitors, colors of products may also appear different to those shown on the site.

Designs and specifications are subject to change without notice.

TS-464-4G

CPU Intel® Celeron® N5095 4 kerner/4 tråde processor, burst op til 2,9 GHz CPU-arkitektur 64-bit x86 Grafikprocessorer Intel® UHD Graphics Floating Point-enhed Krypteringsmotor (AES-NI) Hardwareaccelereret transkodning Systemhukommelse 4 GB SODIMM DDR4 (1 x 4 GB) Maksimal hukommelse 16 GB (2 x 8 GB) Hukommelsesslot 2 x SODIMM DDR4

Til dual-DIMM-konfigurationer skal du bruge et par identiske DDR4-moduler.

Flash-hukommelse 4 GB (Dual boot OS-beskyttelse) Drevplads 4 x 3,5" SATA 6 Gb/s

Systemet leveres uden harddisk.

Listen med harddiskkompatibilitet kan findes på https://www.qnap.com/compatibility/

Drevkompatibilitet 3,5-tommer SATA harddiske

2,5-tommer SATA solid state drev Hot-swap M.2-slot 2 x M.2 2280 PCIe Gen 3 x1

Compatible with NVMe SSD PCIe Gen 3 and above. Please refer to https://www.qnap.com/compatibility/ for compatibility.

Understøttelse af SSD-cacheacceleration 2,5 Gigabit Ethernet-port (2,5 G/1 G/100 M) 2 (2,5 G/1 G/100 M/10 M) 5 Gigabit Ethernet-port (5 G/2,5 G/1 G/100 M) Valgfrit via PCIe-udvidelseskort 10 Gigabit Ethernet-port Valgfrit via PCIe-udvidelseskort Wake on LAN (WOL) Jumbo-ramme PCIe-slot 1

Slot 1: PCIe Gen 3 x2

Kortmål for PCIe-slot: 190 x 68,9 x 18,76 mm / 7,48 x 2,71 x 0,74 tommer.

USB 2.0-port 2 USB 3.2 Gen 2-port (10 Gbps) 2 x Type A IR-sensor (valgfri QNAP RM-IR004 fjernbetjening) HDMI™ -udgang 1, HDMI™ 2.1 (up to 4096 x 2160 @ 60Hz) Formfaktor Tower LED-indikatorer Strøm/Status, LAN, USB, HDD 1-4 Knapper Strøm, USB-kopi, Nulstil Mål (HxBxD) 165 × 170 × 226.5 mm

Dimensioner inkluderer ikke fodpude (fodpude kan være op til 30mm / 1,18 tommer høj afhængig af model)

Vægt (netto) 2.26 kg Vægt (brutto) 3.59 kg Driftstemperatur 0 - 40 °C (32 - 104 °F) Opbevaringstemperatur -20 - 70 °C (-4 - 158 °F) Relativ luftfugtighed 5-95 % RH ikke-kondenserende, vådtemperatur: 27 ˚C (80,6 ˚F) Strømforsyningsenhed 90 W-adapter, 100-240 V Strømforbrug: HDD-slumretilstand 21.618 W Strømforbrug: Driftstilstand, typisk 40.536 W

Testet med drevene helt fyldt op.

Blæser 1 x 120 mm, 12 VDC Systemadvarsel Summer Kensington-sikkerhedsslot Standardgaranti 3 Maks. antal samtidige forbindelser (CIFS) - med maks. hukommelse 1500

Note: Use only QNAP memory modules to maintain system performance and stability. For NAS devices with more than one memory slot, use QNAP modules with identical specifications and refer to the hardware user manual to install compatible QNAP memory modules.

Warning: Using unsupported modules may degrade performance, cause errors, or prevent the operating system from starting.

QNAP reserves the right to replace partial parts or accessories if the original is no longer available from its manufacturer/supplier. Any replacement would be fully tested and verified to meet strict compatibility and stability guidelines and will deliver identical performance to the original.

The terms HDMI, HDMI High-Definition Multimedia Interface, HDMI trade dress and the HDMI Logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of HDMI Licensing Administrator, Inc.

Requires minimum 2GB memory.

RAID Type

8-bay (and more): JBOD, Single, RAID 0, 1, 5, 6, 10, 50, 60

6-bay: JBOD, Single, RAID 0, 1, 5, 6, 10, 50

4-bay: JBOD, Single, RAID 0, 1, 5, 6, 10

2-bay: JBOD, Single, RAID 0, 1

RAID Group

To ensure data security, system stability, and storage performance, the maximum number of drives for a single RAID group is now 16 (applicable to RAID 5, RAID 6, RAID TP, and subgroups of RAID 50 and RAID 60). Nevertheless, users can combine multiple RAID groups into a large storage pool that contains more than 16 drives, using RAID 50, RAID 60, or RAID 10 as the RAID configuration. This enhancement will only be applied to new RAID groups. All existing RAID groups and storage systems will not be affected.

Note: To use exFat in certain models you must purchase an exFAT driver license from License Center.
